summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1304, for the improvement of the alley in Block Three (3) of Boren and Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, (same being the alley between Second Avenue and Third Avenue, from Cherry Street to James Street) by grading and paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 14350 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
